text: Nyasaye â€“ Abulao Nyasaye owulali ye tawe Omulamu, owemelanga amakhuwa koosi buli lwoosi, sharengetsanga nohomba shakonanga tawe, nebibie biosi yenyene bili mwikulu nende khushialo, niwina oyo unyala ukhusabila imbeli wuwe halali khukhuchama khukhwe? Amanyile kali imbeli wabu nende inyuma wabu, Nabo shibamanyile shiosishiosi mubumanyi bubwe tawe halali khulia wayenya omwene. Obunyali bubwe bwasalaana mwikulu nende khushialo, ne shashilungwa okhubilinda tawe, Naye niye uli hekulu omukhongo muno
